website_summaries.verdict: This beard bib is a good fit for men who have slender to average necks.
pros: Comes with a beard shaping comb
Beard shaper is made of heavy wood, so you don't need to worry about chipping it with razor or clippers
cons: May be a bit small for men with thicker necks

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Super easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to handle the mess my husband makes when he trims his beard. When I got it I was actually surprised by the quality. The cape is soft, but durable, just like at a high end barbershop, and it came with a wood comb and a nice bag to keep it all in. When he used it there was no mess and the cape was super easy to clean. Just a little shake outside and that was that! Overall I’m very happy with it. It did exactly what I wanted it to and it’s quality exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Phenyx

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: It is so hard to buy my husband a gift! He doesn’t find a use in anything I purchase for him. This was one of my last tries to nail a gift.. and, it was perfect for me because the mess that he leaves after shaving is driving me crazy..! This gift was perfect! He uses it and it has very small instructions and assembly, so here is no confusion on how to use it, even without my help! 🙃
customer_reviews.author: Simha Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Extending my boyfriend's life
customer_reviews.text: This is preventing a lot of arguments. The comb isn't a hit, but the bib is a winner! I only wish it was a smoother (less sticky) fabric so that every hair would easily fall off of it and into the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Great product, just be weary of storage issues
customer_reviews.text: Between the shaping comb and the bib, this is a great way to shave my beard, but one of the suction cups on the end of the bib came creased in half, causing it to fall off the mirror and spilling my shavings all over the sink/counter top, thus defeating the purpose. I was hoping after some usage and careful storage the suction cup would unroll some and stop causing problems but I've used it three times and straighten out the cups when I put it away and it's still falling off the mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Foster

customer_reviews.title: Great idea!
customer_reviews.text: I got this apron for husband because I was tired of the mess on the sink when he would shaved. No more mess. I’m very happy. This is great. I’ll be buying a few more for my sons and son in law. I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: The apron does well
customer_reviews.text: The apron makes a world of difference when it comes to keeping your beard trimmings off the counter. Cleanup is easy, just shake it off in a trash bag. Suction cups can be tricky to get seated but hold well. Only thing I dont like is the shaping comb tool. It's too thick and awkward to use. The comb is virtually useless for shorter beards.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Easy clean up
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a gift for my boyfriend! He used it last night, sadly he said he forgot about it for the first half of his shave so I had one last time of cleaning those dang hairs off the sink! Great product, he said it work well. The suction cups stuck and made the clean up easy. He didn’t love the beard shaper but I see that as an added bonus with the beard bib. Thank you inventor of the beard bib!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Saves time and effort
customer_reviews.text: Only buy this if you like convenience a clean sink, and saving time. I'm 6'4 225 and it works great for me. I use it to buzz all my hair an a full beard. It catches all but a few hairs with very little effort.

customer_reviews.title: My wife is happy

customer_reviews.title: Meh product
customer_reviews.text: The brush was probably the most quality item of all the things we received. The bag was falling apart and the suction cups were too curved in and wouldn’t stick to the mirror. Good thing I bought two by accident because I had better luck with the second one sticking to the mirror but the second bag still had strings left and right sticking out. It was a gift for my hubby but wouldn’t buy again for that much money.

customer_reviews.title: It's funny how such a simple concept ends up being so ...

customer_reviews.title: It works! And I don’t have to find random hairs lingering on my floors and counters!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I got this for my husband because his beard hair was always getting all over the floor and in the bathroom sink. This seemed like the perfect fix in my mind, but my hubby was a little hesitant to try it. After bribing him a bit, he used it and laughed out loud at the sheer joy of seeing all the trimmings collected in one space. It works! It actually works! He was able to dump it all straight into the trash and I was able to not find random hairs on towels, clothes, skin etc. WIN/WIN! The comb that comes with the kit is also great quality and uniquely shaped for all your bearding needs!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Givens

customer_reviews.title: Time saver! Easy cleanup.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for husband for Christmas. He seems to enjoy having this, it’s much easier to clean up now, rather than getting hair all over the bathroom sink. Update 1/7/19 my husband has tried to make this work a few times now and the suction cups don’t work well and we are returning it because it’s cheaply made as a whole .
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Hodge

customer_reviews.title: Beard bib for the win
customer_reviews.text: Happy to buy this for my fiancé because I hate when he trims and leaves tiny facial hair all over the sink and in drain. He likes it also because it's an easier clean up. He said he wouldn't use the shaper, but hopefully he will. One thing he mentioned about the shapers comb and I agree is the comb should have been the whole bottom part, making the forks go across the whole bottom. The bib itself barely fit his neck, he is stocky. Should have more room in the neck hole. It is more expensive than others. All in all though decent product.
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: Nice wooden beard shaper not the cheap plastic used by other products.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. No more hair in and all around the sink and my beard lines are always perfect. The beard shaper is a nice heavy wood and not the cheap plastic. So you can use this with clippers or razors without fear of the edges getting chipped which happened with one of the plastic ones I had before ordering this one.
